# API Documentation - RESTful API with Validation
## Base URL ``` http://localhost:3000/api ```
## Error Response Format
All errors follow this structure: ```json { "success": false, "error": { "code": "ERROR_CODE", "message": "Error description", "details": [] // Only for validation errors } } ```
## Error Codes
### Authentication Errors (1000-1099) - `AUTH_1001` - Invalid credentials - `AUTH_1002` - Email not found - `AUTH_1009` - Email already exists - `AUTH_1017` - Unauthorized
### User Errors (1100-1199) - `USER_1101` - User not found - `USER_1102` - User update failed - `USER_1103` - User delete failed
### Space Errors (1200-1299) - `SPACE_1201` - Space not found - `SPACE_1202` - Space create failed - `SPACE_1203` - Space update failed - `SPACE_1204` - Space delete failed - `SPACE_1205` - Space fork failed
### Validation Errors (2000-2099) - `VALIDATION_2001` - Validation failed - `VALIDATION_2002` - Invalid email format - `VALIDATION_2003` - Required field missing
---
## Authentication Routes (`/api/auth`)
### 1. Register User **POST** `/api/auth/signup`
**Request Body:** ```json { "name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com", "password": "password123" } ```
**Validation:** - `name`: 2-100 characters, required - `email`: valid email format, required - `password`: 6-100 characters, required
**Success Response (201):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com", "created_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
**Error Response (409):** ```json { "success": false, "error": { "code": "AUTH_1009", "message": "Email already exists" } } ```
---
### 2. Login User **POST** `/api/auth/login`
**Request Body:** ```json { "email": "john@example.com", "password": "password123" } ```
**Validation:** - `email`: valid email format, required - `password`: required
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com", "created_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
**Error Response (401):** ```json { "success": false, "error": { "code": "AUTH_1001", "message": "Invalid email or password" } } ```
---
### 3. Logout User **DELETE** `/api/auth/:id/logout`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: User UUID (required)
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "message": "Logged out successfully" } } ```
---
## User Routes (`/api/users`)
### 1. Get User by ID **GET** `/api/users/:id`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: User UUID (required)
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com", "avatar_url": null, "created_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
**Error Response (404):** ```json { "success": false, "error": { "code": "USER_1101", "message": "User not found" } } ```
---
### 2. Update User Name **PUT** `/api/users/:id/name`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: User UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "name": "Jane Doe" } ```
**Validation:** - `name`: 2-100 characters, required
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "name": "Jane Doe", "email": "john@example.com", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 3. Update User Email **PUT** `/api/users/:id/email`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: User UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "email": "newemail@example.com" } ```
**Validation:** - `email`: valid email format, required
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "name": "Jane Doe", "email": "newemail@example.com", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 4. Update User Avatar **PUT** `/api/users/:id/avatar`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: User UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "avatar_url": "https://example.com/avatar.jpg" } ```
**Validation:** - `avatar_url`: valid URI or null/empty
**Note:** File upload functionality is placeholder - implement with multer/file handling
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "name": "Jane Doe", "email": "newemail@example.com", "avatar_url": "https://example.com/avatar.jpg", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 5. Delete User **DELETE** `/api/users/:id`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: User UUID (required)
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "message": "User deleted successfully" } } ```
---
## Space Routes (`/api/spaces`)
### 1. Get All Spaces **GET** `/api/spaces`
**Query Parameters (optional):** - `user_id`: Filter by user UUID
**Example:** `/api/spaces?user_id=uuid`
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": [ { "id": "uuid", "user_id": "uuid", "title": "My Space", "description": "A relaxing space", "background_id": "uuid", "created_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } ] } ```
---
### 2. Get Space by ID **GET** `/api/spaces/:id`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "user_id": "uuid", "title": "My Space", "description": "A relaxing space", "background_id": "uuid", "clock_font_id": "uuid", "text_font_name": "Arial", "created_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 3. Create Space **POST** `/api/spaces`
**Request Body:** ```json { "user_id": "uuid", "title": "My New Space", "description": "A peaceful workspace", "background_id": "uuid", "clock_font_id": "uuid", "text_font_name": "Roboto" } ```
**Validation:** - `user_id`: UUID format, required - `title`: max 200 characters, optional - `description`: max 1000 characters, optional - `background_id`: UUID format, optional - `clock_font_id`: UUID format, optional - `text_font_name`: max 100 characters, optional
**Success Response (201):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "user_id": "uuid", "title": "My New Space", "description": "A peaceful workspace", "created_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 4. Update Space Description **PUT** `/api/spaces/:id/description`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "description": "Updated description" } ```
**Validation:** - `description`: max 1000 characters, optional (can be null/empty)
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "description": "Updated description", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 5. Update Text Font **PUT** `/api/spaces/:id/font-text`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "text_font_name": "Helvetica" } ```
**Validation:** - `text_font_name`: max 100 characters, required
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "text_font_name": "Helvetica", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 6. Update Clock Font **PUT** `/api/spaces/:id/font-clock`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "clock_font_id": "uuid" } ```
**Validation:** - `clock_font_id`: UUID format, required
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "clock_font_id": "uuid", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 7. Update Background **PUT** `/api/spaces/:id/background`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "background_id": "uuid" } ```
**Validation:** - `background_id`: UUID format, required
**Note:** File upload functionality is placeholder - implement with multer/file handling
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "id": "uuid", "background_id": "uuid", "updated_at": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } } ```
---
### 8. Update Widget Positions **PUT** `/api/spaces/:id/position`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "positions": [ { "widget_name": "clock", "x_position": 100, "y_position": 200 }, { "widget_name": "weather", "x_position": 300, "y_position": 400 } ] } ```
**Validation:** - `positions`: array of position objects, required - Each position must have: `widget_name` (string), `x_position` (number), `y_position` (number)
**Note:** This is a prototype - implement widget_positions table logic
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "message": "Positions updated successfully" } } ```
---
### 9. Delete Space **DELETE** `/api/spaces/:id`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "message": "Space deleted successfully" } } ```
---
### 10. Fork Space **POST** `/api/spaces/:id/fork`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Space UUID (required)
**Request Body:** ```json { "user_id": "uuid" } ```
**Note:** This is a prototype - implement space duplication logic
**Success Response (201):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "message": "Space forked successfully" } } ```
---
### 11. Delete Forked Space **DELETE** `/api/spaces/:id/fork/:forkId`
**URL Parameters:** - `id`: Original space UUID (required) - `forkId`: Forked space UUID (required)
**Note:** This is a prototype - implement fork deletion logic
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "data": { "message": "Forked space deleted successfully" } } ```
---
## Health Check
### Health Check **GET** `/api/health`
**Success Response (200):** ```json { "success": true, "message": "API is running", "timestamp": "2025-11-13T00:00:00.000Z" } ```
---
## Validation Error Example
When validation fails, you'll receive:
**Error Response (400):** ```json { "success": false, "error": { "code": "VALIDATION_2001", "message": "Validation failed", "details": [ { "field": "email", "message": "Invalid email format" }, { "field": "password", "message": "Password must be at least 6 characters" } ] } } ```
---
## Architecture
``` ├── controllers/ # Handle requests & responses │ ├── auth.controller.js │ ├── user.controller.js │ └── space.controller.js ├── services/ # Business logic │ ├── user.service.js │ └── space.service.js ├── repositories/ # Database operations │ ├── user.repository.js │ └── space.repository.js ├── routes/ # API endpoints │ ├── auth.routes.js │ ├── user.routes.js │ └── space.routes.js ├── middleware/ # Request processing │ ├── asyncHandler.js │ ├── validate.js │ └── errorHandler.js ├── validations/ # Joi schemas │ ├── user.validation.js │ └── space.validation.js └── constants/ └── errorCodes.js # Error code definitions ```
## Notes
### TODO - Prototype Functions The following functions are implemented as prototypes (return success messages only): - `DELETE /api/auth/:id/logout` - Implement session/token invalidation - `PUT /api/users/:id/avatar` - Implement file upload with multer - `PUT /api/spaces/:id/background` - Implement file upload with multer - `PUT /api/spaces/:id/position` - Implement widget_positions table updates - `POST /api/spaces/:id/fork` - Implement space duplication logic - `DELETE /api/spaces/:id/fork/:forkId` - Implement fork deletion logic
